name: BasicPuzzlePlatformer
description:
This is a basic puzzle platformer made as a test before I work on more advanced action platformers.

This game is simple. It is a run of the mill platformer with jumping and puzzles. 

There is no sound in the game whatsoever.

If there is enough support for this project, I may make a direct sequel to this game.

NOTE: I just realized I gave an incorrect tutorial. The D pad does not work for this game.  I will probably not bother to patch this out.
